sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke 'Bank' page system mein kahan located hai.

steps.description: 'Bank' section par click karay, aur aap 'Bank' page par aa jaogay.
Ab aap 'Bank' page par ho. Yahan aap bank add, view, edit, search ya delete kar sakte ho.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke 'Wallet' page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'Wallet' section par click karay, aur aap 'Wallet' page par aa jaogay.
Ab aap 'Wallet' page par ho. Yahan se aap wallet add, view, edit ya delete kar sakte ho.

sections.section_title: Bank ki details dekhnay ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke 'Bank' kaise search hota hai.

steps.description: 'Bank' section par click karay, aur aap 'Bank' page par aa jaogay.
'Bank' page ke top left corner mein 'Search' icon par click karay.
'Bank' name type karay. Agar wo system mein hoga to aap ko show ho jayega.

sections.section_title: Wallet ki details dekhnay ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein bataya gaya hai ke wallet ko system mein kaise search karte hain.

steps.description: 'Wallet' section par click karay, aur aap 'Wallet' page par aa jaogay.
'Wallet' page ke top left corner mein 'Search' icon par click karay.
Jis 'Wallet' ka naam search karna hai woh type karay. Agar 'Wallet' maujood hoga to show ho jayega.

sections.description: Is section mein bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya bank kaise add hota hai.

steps.description: 'Bank' section par click karay, aur aap 'Bank' page par aa jaogay.
'Bank' page par top right corner mein '+' icon par click karay.
Pop-up mein 5 fields hongi: 'Bank Name', 'Bank Short Name', 'Bank Headquarter', 'Bank Code', aur 'Status'. Saare fields fill karay aur 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.description: Is section mein bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya wallet kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'Wallet' section par click karay, aur aap 'Wallet' page par pohanch jaogay.
'Wallet' page par top right corner mein maujood '+' icon par click karay.
Pop-up mein do fields hongi: 'Transaction Type' (dropdown) aur 'Status' (dropdown). Dono select karay aur 'Add' button par click karay.
